Courses.name: Introduction to Programming
Courses.syllabus: Fundamentals of programming using a high-level language.
Courses.objectives: Understand basic programming constructs, develop problem-solving skills.
Courses.requiredMaterials: Textbook: 'Starting Out with Python', Code editor

Courses.name: Data Structures and Algorithms
Courses.syllabus: Study of fundamental data structures and algorithm analysis.
Courses.objectives: Learn about various data structures, analyze algorithm efficiency.

Courses.name: Database Management Systems
Courses.syllabus: Introduction to database systems and their management.
Courses.objectives: Understand database design, query languages, and transaction management.

Courses.name: Web Development
Courses.syllabus: Design and development of dynamic web applications.
Courses.objectives: Learn front-end and back-end web technologies, build interactive websites.
Courses.requiredMaterials: Textbook: 'HTML and CSS: Design and Build Websites', Web development tools

Courses.name: Operating Systems
Courses.syllabus: Study of operating system principles and functionality.
Courses.objectives: Understand process management, memory management, and file systems.
Courses.requiredMaterials: Textbook: 'Operating System Concepts', Operating system environment

Courses.name: Software Engineering
Courses.syllabus: Introduction to software development methodologies and practices.
Courses.objectives: Learn software development lifecycle, design patterns, and testing techniques.
Courses.requiredMaterials: Textbook: 'Software Engineering: A Practitioner's Approach', Development tools

Courses.name: Computer Networks
Courses.syllabus: Study of computer network architecture, protocols, and communication.
Courses.objectives: Understand network models, routing algorithms, and network security.
Courses.requiredMaterials: Textbook: 'Computer Networking: A Top-Down Approach', Networking equipment

Courses.name: Artificial Intelligence
Courses.syllabus: Introduction to artificial intelligence concepts and techniques.
Courses.objectives: Learn about search algorithms, knowledge representation, and machine learning.
Courses.requiredMaterials: Textbook: 'Artificial Intelligence: A Modern Approach', AI software

Courses.name: Mobile Application Development
Courses.syllabus: Design and development of mobile applications for various platforms.
Courses.objectives: Explore mobile UI design, mobile app architectures, and deployment strategies.
Courses.requiredMaterials: Textbook: 'Mobile Application Development', Mobile development tools

Courses.name: Cybersecurity
Courses.syllabus: Study of security threats, vulnerabilities, and countermeasures in computer systems.
Courses.objectives: Understand cryptography, network security, and security policies.
Courses.requiredMaterials: Textbook: 'Principles of Computer Security', Security tools
